column1: This was one observer who lived at 38 Bitton St
He also had a gauge at the reservoir (1877-1893), and took his gauge when he moved to Exeter Road in 1906
1892 Jan Gauge moved to Marine Villa (see Teignmouth-Woodlands)
1893 Feb 22nd-Dec 9th Gauge was at the Infirmary. Cannot fing it, but there was an Isolation Hospital just the other side of Bitton House
If this is where the gauge moved to, the altitude would be only a little lower
1898 Gauge marked as terminating at the end of March and re-starting at the start of July
1900 July Aug value taken from Bonnicliffe
1906 June 14th Gauge moved to Benton, Exeter Road. See BENTON
